meanings.definition: The degree of compactness of a substance.
meanings.sent1: The density of the rock made it heavy.
meanings.sent2: The density of the population in the city was high.
meanings.sent3: The density of the cake batter made it difficult to spread evenly.
meanings.sent4: The density of the fog obscured the view of the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The density of the forest made it challenging to navigate through.

meanings.definition: The quantity of something per unit measure.
meanings.sent1: The density of sugar in the solution was high.
meanings.sent2: The density of cars on the highway caused traffic jams.
meanings.sent3: The density of books on the shelf made it look cluttered.
meanings.sent4: The density of stars in the sky was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The density of information in the report was overwhelming.

meanings.sent1: The density of the fog made it hard to see through.
meanings.sent2: The density of the paint affected its coverage.
meanings.sent3: The density of the fog made it seem like a fluffy blanket.
meanings.sent4: The density of the fog was like a veil over the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The density of the fabric determined its warmth.
